title: NK Zagorje
text: Nogometni klub Zagorje (), commonly referred to as NK Zagorje or simply Zagorje, is a Slovenian <a href="association%20football">football</a> club which plays in the town of <a href="Zagorje%20ob%20Savi">Zagorje ob Savi</a>. They play in the <a href="MNZ%20Ljubljana">Regional Ljubljana League</a>, the fourth highest league in Slovenia. The club was founded in 1923. Zagorje have a long-standing local rivalry with <a href="NK%20Rudar%20Trbovlje">NK Rudar Trbovlje</a>, which is known as the <a href="Central%20Sava%20Valley">Zasavje</a> Derby.
